Package chess

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece
      • chess.Pawn
  • public class Pawn
extends Piece
    This class models the pawn chess piece, which is an extension of the abstract Piece object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pawn​(java.lang.String color)
      This is the constructor for the Pawn piece.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pawn

        public Pawn​(java.lang.String color)
        This is the constructor for the Pawn piece. It accepts either white or black and returns an instance of Pawn object.
        Parameters:
        color - accepts either "white" or "black"

    • Method Detail

      • setCanBeEnpassanted

        public void setCanBeEnpassanted​(boolean b)
        This is a setter method to set the value of the canBeEnpassanted variable.
        Parameters:
        b - if this pawn piece can be enpassanted and the canBeEnpassanted state variable should be set to true.

      • setWillEnpassant

        public void setWillEnpassant​(boolean b)
        This is a setter method to set the value of the willEnpassant variable.
        Parameters:
        b - if this pawn piece can perform enpassant and the willEnpassant state variable should be set to true.

      • getCanBeEnpassanted

        public boolean getCanBeEnpassanted()
        This is a getter method to return the current value of the canBeEnpassanted variable.
        Returns:
        true if this pawn piece can be enpassanted.

      • getWillEnpassant

        public boolean getWillEnpassant()
        This is a getter method to return the current value of the willEnpassant variable.
        Returns:
        true if this pawn piece can perform enpassant.

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove​(int startRow,
                           int startColumn,
                           int endRow,
                           int endColumn,
                           Tile[][] board)
        This method checks to see if the move made by the pawn is in the correct motion and within the correct amount of allowed spaces.
        Parameters:
        startRow - Row before move
        startColumn - Column before move
        endRow - Row after move
        endColumn - Column after move
        board - board after move
        Returns:
        true if move is able to be made.

      • blackEnpassant

        public boolean blackEnpassant​(int startRow,
                              int endRow,
                              int startColumn,
                              int endColumn,
                              Tile[][] board)
        This method checks if the black player is able to enpassant.
        Parameters:
        startRow - Row before move
        startColumn - Column before move
        endRow - Row after move
        endColumn - Column after move
        board - board after move
        Returns:
        true if black player can enpassant.

      • blackValid

        public boolean blackValid​(int startRow,
                          int endRow,
                          int startColumn,
                          int endColumn,
                          Tile[][] board)
        This method checks if the black player is making a valid move.
        Parameters:
        startRow - Row before move
        startColumn - Column before move
        endRow - Row after move
        endColumn - Column after move
        board - board after move
        Returns:
        true if black player can make move since move is valid.

      • updateBoard

        public Tile[][] updateBoard​(int startRow,
                            int startColumn,
                            int endRow,
                            int endColumn,
                            Tile[][] board)
        This method updates the chessboard based on the move that was input by the pawn.
        Parameters:
        startRow - Row before move
        startColumn - Column before move
        endRow - Row after move
        endColumn - Column after move
        board - board after move
        Returns:
        chessboard which is updated with the proposed move.

      • checkForPromotion

        public Tile[][] checkForPromotion​(java.lang.String input,
                                  Tile[][] board)
        This method checks if moving pawn is eligible for promotion.
        Parameters:
        input - basic parameters for method to understand board layout and see if propomotion is due.
        board - board before promotion
        Returns:
        chessboard which is updated with the promoted/unpromoted pawn moves.
